Body:
""" wedge, chi = 25,30 """
w, c = 25, 30
SANITY = False
if SANITY:
    print('*' * 80)
om = np.zeros(self.np, np.float)
g_old = transform.compute_g_vectors(self.tth, self.eta, self.omega, self.
    wvln, wedge=w, chi=c)
if SANITY:
    print(g_old.shape, '\n', g_old[:, :3])
k = transform.compute_k_vectors(self.tth, self.eta, self.wvln)
if SANITY:
    print('k=', k[:, :3])
post = gv_general.chiwedge(chi=c, wedge=w)
g_new = gv_general.k_to_g(k, self.omega, axis=[0, 0, -1], post=post)
if SANITY:
    print(g_new.shape, g_new[:, :3])
if SANITY:
    print('end routine')
if SANITY:
    print('*' * 80)
self.assertAlmostEqual(array_diff(g_new, g_old), 0, 6)
